programme.title: Clinton and 'Me too' Democrats
programme.short_synopsis: Newt Gingrich becomes Speaker of the US House of Representatives.
programme.medium_synopsis: Newt Gingrich becomes speaker of the US House of Representatives. American apathy towards foreign policy and Clinton's shift towards the centre are explored by Alistair Cooke.
